REVIEW.Name: Staff
REVIEW.RHighlight: The views over the gardens, pool and ocean from the sunset terrace and the two Ocean Rooms are fabulous and we were very impressed with the chef’s delicious creations. Being in an unspoiled traditional Balinese village was also a delight.
REVIEW.ROverallComments:
Arriving at Seseh Beach Villa after dark, our first impressions were of a luxurious haven under a vast starlit sky. The crests of huge waves crashing onto the beach just beyond the villa gardens reflected brightly in the moonlight. It was an exciting and exotic welcome.
After a deep sleep in a super-comfortable four-poster bed in one of the upstairs Ocean Rooms, we drew back the curtains to get our bearings. The ocean looked as amazing as it had sounded the night before, and from below a cloudless sky the gardens and pool beckoned. Breakfast was a feast of fresh fruit, good coffee and freshly baked pastries – a great start to the day. Later we enjoyed a delicious chargrilled salmon salad, which confirmed the chef’s skills and had us eagerly anticipating our next meal. A chat with the friendly villa manager armed us with the information we needed to go on an exploratory walk around the village, which gave us some fascinating glimpses into rural Bali life. The beach is beautiful for walking and photos, but huge waves warned us away from the water.
We thought that the layout at Seseh Beach Villa – both inside and out – would work very well for both family holidaymakers and for wedding parties. Nearly all rooms face the gardens and ocean and the two bales at each end of the lovely long pool make gorgeous, breezy outdoor living areas. A second Seseh Beach Villa, situated immediately behind the first, will open next year, making this an even better wedding destination, with a total of 11 bedrooms across both villas.
Seseh’s rural location may not make it everyone’s cup of tea, but a complimentary car and driver make it easy to reach Canggu and Seminyak should you want to. Personally, we were very happy just to rest, relax and enjoy the villa.
REVIEW.RUnpleasantSurprise: The surf is really loud, but you soon get used to it and we enjoyed being lulled to sleep by the sound of the waves. We thought it curious that the sunset terrace can only be reached via the Ocean Room bathrooms, but the manager informed us that there are plans afoot to build stairs from the gardens at the back.

REVIEW.Name: HotelBank PTE LTD
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a wonderful stay . The staff were extremely helpful and made the holiday very comfortable. Excellent get away holiday location.

REVIEW.Name: Nicole Beaudoin
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We loved this villa,the staff was wonderful and the location was great,far enough to get away from the tourist crowd and close enough to go out for a meal or shopping. We rented motor bikes which is a must if you want to avoid traffic.

REVIEW.Name: Andy Lim
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Staff was good, especially Adi. The game consoles were especially appreciated. Spacious, and cool interiors. Everything was always very clean .

REVIEW.Name: Shannon Jimenez
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The villa was absolutely perfect for us in every way. The staff was amazing; nothing was too much trouble and everyone always had a smile. We felt pampered and relaxed and hated to leave.

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments:
Thank you so much for making such a special occasion even more wonderful.!!! Your hospitality has been amazing and what a beautiful place to stay - Rachelle - Maid of Honour.
A Fantastic stay, everyone was very kind and helpful. We have been spoilt! A wonderful venue for a wedding. A wonderful place to stay. Thank you. - Jan, Peter Davies - Parent of Groom.
I never imagined a place so beautiful as this for my daughters wedding. It has been perfect in every way. Thank you Seseh Beach Villas and the lovely staff. - Jenny Sharp - Mother of Bride.

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Amazing Villas, could not have asked for a better place to get married. Staff are wonderful, helpful and nothing is to hard. We will return again.

REVIEW.Name: The Seven Group (PT Maharta, PT Bukit Buluh)
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Adi and staff you have given us the most magical place for our wedding. You were all so kind and caring and we can't thank you enough for all the love and hard work you have giving us during our stay. We all wish we can stay longer. All the very best, Love Charlee and Chris (Bride and Groom)

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Amazing venue, perfect service and beautiful people! Best wedding package ever. Fantastic experience and a wedding unforgettable and as captivating as any moment should ever be.

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you to amazing staff - you have made our wedding a magical experience. The last 3 days have been so amazing!!! Thank you for your incredible hospitality, we couldn't be happier.

REVIEW.Name: Eight on its side/ The Soiree Wedding and Events
REVIEW.ROverallComments: To the team at Seseh, thank you for all that you have done to make our stay here so wonderful. We choose Seseh as our spot in Bali to get married and it really was magical spot. Best night ever. Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Seseh, i am speechless. No words could ever describe the experience we have had here over the past few days. The staff has been incredible and this villa has been magical.

REVIEW.Name: Penny Foulger Guest
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thanks to all the staff. We had an amazing time and would come back anytime. Team Seseh, you guys made our stay fantastic. Great food, great service, happy smile and never ending Bintang.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Villas Reservation Network / BVRN
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had the most amazing wedding in Seseh Beach Villas. All the staff especially Adi and Merta were wonderful with us. Everything seem to be just perfect. We felt in love with the villa, the room, the pool and this spectacular view! We will come back for our 1st Anniversary. Thank you so much for making our dream come true!

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Adi and team, what a beautiful place! We had an amazing time and the staff are wonderful. Thank you for everything. We hope to be back one day soon.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Wedding Expert *contract suspended until dec 2017*
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Incredible venue, amazing and super friendly staff, stunning views, beautiful weddings, fun memories. Everything was perfect! Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Friends, sunsets, food, smiles, yoga, beach, green. An amazing time at Seseh - looking forward to returning again soon.

REVIEW.Name: Sense Luxury Sense Luxury
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Very enjoyable stay. Thanks to all well prepared and serving staff, i made the best successful proposal to my lovely fiance. Especially Adi did the most important job for getting me the fireworks, candles, love letter and etc. I wish that i could come with my family.

REVIEW.Name: Getaways Villa
REVIEW.ROverallComments: This villa is beautiful. The staff and service were amazing. We had a lovely family reunion. This villa also has a beautiful golden retriever, Angel. The only wish we had were to spend more time with Angel. Thank you for letting us stay in your lovely place.

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Wow! Seseh Beach Villas has been a wonderful, amazing family experience for firstly 3 days of relaxing, then the most wonderful experience when two families have come together for our wedding. The staff have been truly first class, warm, caring, polite with nothing seeming to difficult to change, arrange or provide advice. Thank you all and hope to see you again soon. Best wishes.

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for wonderful 10 days. The food was marvelous. The villa is gorgeous - the staff are so kind and helpful and gracious. You made our stay a very rich experience - I loved the stillness in the morning while i meditated as i watched the ocean view. Thanks and hope to experience again.

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you Seseh for an amazing stay! You and your staff have been very accommodating over the last few days. One of the most beautiful villas we have ever stayed in. Couldn't have asked for a better wedding venue! We have to return one day for another longer stay. Much love.

REVIEW.Name: Vara Wedding.com
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A week of joy, happiness and love with friends and family. Seseh Beach Villa staff are simply amazing. Thank you Adi, Hendra, Dana, Gus, Ram, Mertha, Budi and others that i forget to mention. The chef thank you for all the wonderful food.

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you to the staff at Seseh Beach Villas. We have enjoyed the most amazing wedding with all our friends and family. The facility and staff friendliness has given us the best 3 days of our lives.

REVIEW.Name: PT HITCHED EVENTS BALI
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for a week in paradise! Your staff have been outstanding. We can't wait to come again. See you soon! Thank you for showing us how wonderful Bali, your team and villa are. Enjoyed so much.

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you to all the wonderful staff at Seseh, truly a magic place. Thanks for ensuring all of our guest had the best time ever!

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you all so much for everything you have done for us. You guys are amazing.

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What an amazing place, staff fantastic, wedding decor and food all wonderful. Couldn't have asked for a better wedding venue. We hope to be back soon.

REVIEW.Name: Jee Hyun Noh
REVIEW.ROverallComments: On behalf of all of the guests, i wanted to thank the staff of Seseh Beach Villas for an unforgettable stay. We have all had the time of our lives and a large part of that is due to the staff working tirelessly to ensure our wedding holiday was perfect. We are coming back!

REVIEW.Name: Hello World Hello World
REVIEW.ROverallComments: This is Paradise. Seseh Beach Villas will always have a place in our hearts. Thank you for helping us create the best wedding day ever. All of our guests haven't stopped talking about the amazing staff, venue and facilities. We never want to go home. Cheers for all the memories, we hope to be back again.

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much to all the Seseh Beach Villas staff who made our week long stay truly memorable. They are always kind, courteous, attentive and went the extra mile for anything we desired. The bedrooms are kept super tidy, constantly and the food served is always delicious. I am sure we will return again in the future

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: This has been the most picturesque, perfect setting for our wedding and our families. The service and the attention that we have received from all of you has been second to none. We will return home with the highest of recommendations. You have all exceeded our lofty expectations. We are sad to say good bye, but we have every intention of returning in the future. None of what we have all shared here will ever be forgotten.

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you to Adi and Seseh team for making our son's wedding a memorable lifetime experience. The time spent here was fantastic, we all will never forget. Once again, please accept our deepest thanks.

REVIEW.Name: Dominique Kalvelage
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Dankeschön für den service und die sehr freundliche und zuvor kommende art vom gesamten personal. Ich und meine familie haben uns in dieser villa sehr got aufgehoben gefühlt. Alles gute für die zukunft wünscht.

REVIEW.Name: Nicholas Bain Venn
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Fantastic to be back at Seseh 10 months after our wedding here. Seseh holds a special place in our hearts. Great to share it with more friends for a long weekend from Singapore. Big thank you to all beautiful staff, great food, brilliant service and amazing cafe patron espresso martinis. We hope to come again soon.

REVIEW.Name: Sinan Yilmaz
REVIEW.ROverallComments: From our big family from Beijing, Jakarta, Istanbul, Hamburg, London, Manila and Kuala Lumpur, we would like to thank the team at Seseh Beach Villas for the warm hospitality with excellent service. All of us have enjoyed every single second of our stay. Big compliments to the hard working staff who are always helpful and accommodating to our needs and requests. Thank you from the bottom of our hearts.

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much to the staff at Seseh for being so accommodating, helpful and warm and welcoming. We are so glad we had our wedding here. Beautiful place and beautiful people.

REVIEW.Name: Luxury Retreats
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a spectacular visit, thank you for the warm, lovely hospitality. A vacation of all.

REVIEW.Name: HK GRACE GROUP LIMITED
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for your service. The villas is very beautiful. We enjoyed. We hope to come again.

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: WOW, What an amazing time we had here at Seseh Beach Villas. This was the most perfect location for our beautiful Bali Wedding with 100 guests. The staff were very helpful and were very attentive and willing to assist whenever we asked. Our guest were blown away and the 3 days spent here overwhelmed us and completely left us feeling very spoilt. This has been the most memorable experience for us and our guest and we are so thankful that we chose to have our special day here at Seseh.

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you all for your amazing service. We had an amazing time and a great wedding. Love to visit you guys again somewhere in the near future.

REVIEW.Name: Catherine Jamie
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Wow, what an amazing time we have had staying at the Seseh Beach Villas. The staff have been wonderful. We are so lucky to have had our Wedding Day here.

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for everything over the last few days. Everything has been amazing. We are so lucky to have been married here at Seseh Beach Villas. The staff have been fantastic.

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you all for the fantastic time we had. You made our wedding a huge success and the best day of our lives.

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you all so much for making our stay at the gorgeous Seseh Beach Villas one we will never forget. All the amazing villa staff have been so warm and friendly and assist us on our perfect wedding day. I would stay forever if i could. This place is truly magical.

REVIEW.Name: PT HITCHED EVENTS BALI
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you all for all your hard work and making the wedding so wonderful in your beautiful villas and surroundings. Thank you to all the staff for all your wonderful work and effort. Everything was amazing and you are all such lovely friendly people. God Bless.

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: To the beautiful staff at Seseh - our stay with you has truly been the most special time in our lives. To have our wedding here with you has been incredible. We could never have imagined our wedding venue would be this spectacular. WOW! The service has been brilliant, you are always smiling. Our room was really beautiful. This place will stay in our heart forever and i hope to return here again and again in the future. Thank you for being a huge part of the best day of our lives.

REVIEW.Name: PT HITCHED EVENTS BALI
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Amazing location, spectacular views and magnificent staff! The staff here have made our short stay extra special. The best wedding venue we could have imagine. We will be recommending to others.

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: To the magicians that masquerade as staff at Seseh Villas, you have all done such a wonderful job of dealing with the degenerates that we are! Your attention to detail and service is without fault and is the perfect accomplishment to the excellent villa.

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you to the amazing Seseh Beach Villas staff for helping make our wedding weekend magical. This place is paradise and will always hold a place in our hearts. We and our guests cannot rate more highly on the hospitality, service, food and facilities – we can’t wait to come back.

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: To Adi and the amazing team at Seseh. You really know how to throw a party. Thank you for making our 40th Fabulous. Keep Smiling!

REVIEW.Name: Maggie Lim
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you to the wonderful accommodating staff at Seseh Beach Villas for always knowing what we need before we asked. Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: I will never forget how kind and attentive you were, thank you for being so accommodating and making the villa so beautiful - not to mention the amazing food.

REVIEW.Name: Zoe Clearwater
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had an amazing wedding here. What beautiful staff here to look after our every needs. Such a lovely villa which all of our friends and family enjoyed staying in and don't want to leave.

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We loved our stay here at Seseh Beach Villas. Ram and all the staff do well and amazing service.

REVIEW.Name: PT HITCHED EVENTS BALI
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We don't want to leave and wish we had more time at Seseh Beach Villas.

REVIEW.Name: Glenn Sandhu
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Dear Pak Adi, Pak Hendra and Seseh Team - you guys were amazing and this place is heaven on earth! Thank you so much for everything you have done for us! We will be back for sure, may be to celebrate our anniversary. All our guests loved everything about this place!

REVIEW.Name: Bali Exclusive Wedding Bali Exclusive Wedding
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for such an incredible part of our Bali trip, unforgettable!

REVIEW.Name: Andrew Galak
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Ram and Seseh Beach Villas, thank you for the care you took of us most appreciated. Thank you Merta and good luck for the arrival of the new baby.

REVIEW.Name: Luxury Retreats
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you Seseh Team for an incredible stay. We had the best time. Can't wait to come back.

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for the most amazing stay, looked after us so fantastically - like our extended family. We will miss you.

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Great stay at Seseh Beach Villas. Staff were very helpful and friendly. Would highly recommend to others. Thanks for a great stay.

REVIEW.Name: Daina Hart
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What an amazing time we have had at you villas, you have been so attentive to us and accommodating to our needs. I will most certainly recommend Seseh Beach Villas to my other family and friends. The rooms were wonderful, the food excellent, the friendliness wonderful. Till we meet again.

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Ram, Radha and all staff At Seseh Beach Villas, thanks for giving us one of the best weddings and holiday. Your service is friendly and appreciated by all of us.

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had an unforgettable day. Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: PT HITCHED EVENTS BALI
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A truly wonderful experience to be able to share with our loved family and friends. Cannot thank the staff more for making us feel so relaxed and comfortable. So glad that we now have memories staying at Seseh Beach Villas.

REVIEW.Name: Zoe Malone
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We really enjoyed our stay and you made everything much easier. Thank you for all you help and making our stay enjoyable.

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Seseh, thank you for our wonderful stay at your villas. Special thank you to Ram, Radha, Ray, Budi, and all other staff for making our holiday so amazing.

REVIEW.Name: TA Vilondo
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for the excellent hospitality, we loved our stay in this villa. Staff service was excellent and we all will come back once again.

REVIEW.Name: Like Us Co. Ltd Like Us Co. Ltd
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thanks Radah, Ram and all the staff for taking care of us. It was the best honeymoon and the days are ours to treasure to us. We are looking forward to visiting your villa again someday.

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thanks so much guys, this Is our 3rd stay at Seseh Beach Villas, and our team just love being here. All of the staff are super helpful and its a pleasure to stay here again. Looking forward to our next visit already.

REVIEW.Name: Spellbound Group Pte Ltd
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for such a pleasant experience. The staff were super friendly and took such good care of us. We had such an unforgettable experience. Will be back soon.

REVIEW.Name: Kevin Blake Perez
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for a beautiful couple days. Ram and the gang are amazing hosts.

REVIEW.Name: Joi Samson
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you very much Budi and all the staff. The villa is special, the staff are pleasant, the views are magnificent, the food is delicious.

REVIEW.Name: Airbnb (15.5)
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Beautiful villa, very relaxing atmosphere, looking forward to coming back again.
